text: "When the Children Cry" is a 1988 song by Danish American glam metal band White Lion and is the third and final single from their second studio album Pride. It went to number 2 in Canada, number 3 in the United States, number 7 in Sweden and number 88 in the United Kingdom. ==Track listing== 7-inch single # "When the Children Cry" – 4:04 # "Lady of the Valley" – 6:38 ==References== Category:1988 songs Category:1980s ballads
